name: Gensokyo Odyssey
description:
After a commute to school goes awry, you find yourself lost in a strange land with your only weapon being an air hockey paddle. In this game based on the Touhou Project, use your non-existent charm and wit to join Reimu and Marisa in a quest to save the world! ...probably.

    Features

■ Talk to a wide array of characters

■ Air hockey-based fighting

■ Le funny shenanigans

■ Live-action elements

■ Multiple endings
